loginMsg: Log in to your CAP account
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
emailConfirmed: Your email has been confirmed. You can now log in.
accountNotConfirmedMessage: Your account is not confirmed. Please confirm your email.
confirmationEmailResent: A new confirmation email has been sent.
errorResendingConfirmation: There was an error resending the confirmation email.
confirmYourEmailMsg: Please check your inbox for the confirmation link we sent.
registerError: Registration failed. Please check your details.
oauthExistsError: This account is linked with Google login.
joinWaitListSubtitle: Sign up with your email to get early access to the Cardano Analytics Platform.
successWaitListMsg: Thanks for joining! You’re on the waiting list.
errorWaitListMsg: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
alreadyOnWaitListMsg: This email is already on our waiting list.
walletNotFound: No Cardano wallets detected. Install <nami>Nami</nami>, <lace>Lace</lace>, <flint>Flint</flint> or <eternl>Eternl</eternl> and reload.
